net.automatalib.commons.util

Class IOUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.automatalib.commons.util.IOUtil

  • public abstract class IOUtil
extends Object
    Utility methods for operating with java.io.* classes.
    Author:
    Malte Isberner

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IOUtil() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void copy(InputStream is, OutputStream os)
      Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream and closes the streams.
      static void copy(InputStream is, OutputStream os, boolean close)
      Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream.
      static void copy(Reader r, Writer w)
      Copies all text from the given reader to the given writer and closes both afterwards.
      static void copy(Reader r, Writer w, boolean close)
      Copies all text from the given reader to the given writer.
      static void skip(InputStream is)
      Skips the content of the stream as long as there is data available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IOUtil

        public IOUtil()

    • Method Detail

      • skip

        public static void skip(InputStream is)
                 throws IOException
        Skips the content of the stream as long as there is data available. Afterwards, the stream is closed.
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • copy

        public static void copy(InputStream is,
                        OutputStream os,
                        boolean close)
                 throws IOException
        Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream.
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream.
        os - the output stream.
        close - true if both streams are closed afterwards, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • copy

        public static void copy(InputStream is,
                        OutputStream os)
                 throws IOException
        Copies all data from the given input stream to the given output stream and closes the streams. Convenience method, same as copy(is, os, true).
        Parameters:
        is - the input stream.
        os - the output stream.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        copy(InputStream, OutputStream, boolean)

      • copy

        public static void copy(Reader r,
                        Writer w,
                        boolean close)
                 throws IOException
        Copies all text from the given reader to the given writer.
        Parameters:
        r - the reader.
        w - the writer.
        close - true if both reader and writer are closed afterwards, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.

      • copy

        public static void copy(Reader r,
                        Writer w)
                 throws IOException
        Copies all text from the given reader to the given writer and closes both afterwards. Convenience method, same as copy(r, w, true).
        Parameters:
        r - the reader.
        w - the writer.
        Throws:
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs.
        See Also:
        copy(Reader, Writer, boolean)
